DataElement.preferredName: Study Protocol Research Resource Negation Active Comment ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:The funding, research facilities, and materials available for research_An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.:A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material._Character string datatype stands for text data.
